TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AggregateTokenResolver extends System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver

summary.span: 表示安全标记解析程序，其可包装多个标记解析程序，并解析所有包装的解析程序的标记。

span.span: Represents a security token resolver that can wrap multiple token resolvers and resolve tokens across all of the wrapped resolvers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A对象表示一个实用工具类，可以在您具有密钥标识符或密钥标识符子句时检索安全令牌或密钥。A object represents a utility class that can retrieve security tokens or keys when you have a key identifier or key identifier clause. 包装几个对象。The wraps several objects. 令牌解析程序要包装的构造函数中指定。The token resolvers to be wrapped are specified in the constructor. 属性返回的包装由聚合解析程序的令牌解析程序的集合。The property returns the collection of token resolvers that are wrapped by the aggregate resolver.
